content.question: After a certain pesticide compound is applied to crops, its decomposition is a first-order reaction with a half-life of <math alttext="32.5" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>32.5</mn> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> days. What is the rate constant, <math alttext="k" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, for the decomposition reaction?

choices.label: <math alttext="0.0213 per day" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>0.0213</mn> <mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"> </mspace> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>day</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext=" 0.0308 per day" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>0.0308</mn> <mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"> </mspace> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>day</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="32.5 per day" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>32.5</mn> <mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"> </mspace> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>day</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="46.9 per day" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>46.9</mn> <mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"> </mspace> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>day</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

content.answer: <math alttext="0.0213 per day" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>0.0213</mn> <mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"> </mspace> <mtext> </mtext> <msup> <mrow> <mtext>day</mtext> </mrow> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
